net.ligreto.builders
Class ExcelReportTarget

java.lang.Object
  net.ligreto.builders.ReportTarget
      net.ligreto.builders.ExcelReportTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
TargetInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExcelStreamReportTarget
public class ExcelReportTarget
extends ReportTarget

This is the implementation of the TargetInterface to produce Microsoft Excel HSSF/XSSF files using Apache POI library.

Author:
Julius Stroffek
See Also:
ExcelReportBuilder

Field Detail

cellReferenceMaxRow

protected static int cellReferenceMaxRow
This is a work-around constant that limits the row number in references to functionality like auto filter. Apache POI library will fail if the cell reference contains higher number.

targetInfo

protected ExcelReportBuilder.TargetInfo targetInfo
The information about the target location that is maintained in the report builder.

Compare the specified styles.

Parameters:
s1 - 1st style to comapre
s2 - 2nd style to compare
Returns:
true if the styles are equal

cloneStyle

protected org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle cloneStyle(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle style)
Clones the specified style. First, all existing styles are scanned and if the same style already exists it is re-used. Otherwise, new style is created. This method should be used for style de-duplication. First, you should alter the already existing style as you need. Then call cloneStyle method and then reverse back your changes on the original style object. Further, use the style object returned by cloneStyle as an altered style. See the example below: 
 font = style.getFont();
 style.setFont(newFont);
 CellStyle newStyle = cloneStyle(style);
 cell.setCellStyle(newStyle);
 
 // Revert back the font on the old cell style
 style.setFont(font);

Parameters:
style - the style to be cloned
Returns:
the already existing style if it already exists, otherwise new style will get created and returned

createCell

protected org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell createCell(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row row,
                                                      int col)
This function will get the existing Cell object if it already exists in the file or it will create a new one.

Parameters:
row - the row to get a cell
col - column number
Returns:
the created or already existing Cell object

flush

protected void flush(boolean lastFlush,
                     boolean increaseSizeOnly)
The method called to flush the target. It auto-sizes the columns, creates the auto-filter, etc.

Parameters:
lastFlush - indicates whether this is the last call on the target
increaseSizeOnly - indicates whether the size should be only increased

reportExcelStatisctics

protected void reportExcelStatisctics()
Report the number of styles, fonts and similar characteristics of the excel file. This information is dumped as debug message into the log.

updateCellStyle

protected void updateCellStyle(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Cell cell,
                               BuilderInterface.OutputStyle outputStyle,
                               java.lang.String formatString)
                        throws LigretoException
This function will set the cell style to the specified output style. The function will make sure that there will be only one Font object created for the whole file even if the function is called multiple times for different cells.

Parameters:
cell - the cell where the style should be updated
Throws:
LigretoException

Set the cell style for the specified cell. If the style already exists, it is used instead of creating a new style.

getCellStyle

protected org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle getCellStyle(BuilderInterface.OutputStyle outputStyle,
                                                             java.lang.String formatString)
                                                      throws LigretoException
This method will look for the map of the already created cell styles and if the style does not yet exist new one will get created.

Parameters:
outputStyle - the desired cell style
formatString - the data format string
Returns:
the cell style matching the style type and data format
Throws:
LigretoException - if there was an error creating the style

dumpCell

public void dumpCell(int i,
                     java.lang.Object value,
                     BuilderInterface.OutputFormat outputFormat,
                     BuilderInterface.OutputStyle outputStyle)
              throws LigretoException
Description copied from interface: TargetInterface
Dump the specified object to the position shifted by the specified index. The position is adjusted by the step specified in the call to TargetInterface.setPosition(int, int) or TargetInterface.shiftPosition(int, int) and multiplied by the value of parameter index.

Parameters:
i - the index of the output cell measured by the actual possition in the current row
value - the value to be dumped
outputFormat - the data format to be used
outputStyle - the output style to be used
Throws:
LigretoException - if there was processing error
See Also:
TargetInterface.setPosition(int, int), TargetInterface.shiftPosition(int, int)

            throws java.io.IOException
